alert.note: Alert for Benton; Morrison (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:50PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Benton and southeastern Morrison Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 449 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Foley, or 20 miles southeast of Little Falls, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Benton and southeastern Morrison Counties, including the following locations... Morrill, Gilman, Little Rock, Granite Ledge and Buckman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
